title: Ketu Transit in the 7th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your seventh house brings detachment from dependency in partnerships, marriage, and public alliances. You may feel less inclined to define yourself through relationships, preferring autonomy over constant compromise. Partnerships can feel distant or emotionally muted, prompting reassessment of expectations. This phase exposes imbalances and illusions in commitments. When navigated consciously, Ketu here refines relationship awareness, helping you build bonds based on clarity and equality rather than attachment.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Reduced need for validation through others.

sections.heading: Career
points: Client interactions turn functional, not emotional.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Commitment feels practical rather than romantic.

closing: Ketu in the 7th house removes illusion from partnerships. What remains is a clearer understanding of true relational balance.
